	// Add your code here
	return '';  // return the calculated value

})(current);]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Manager L4</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>u_manager_l4</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><formula/><function_definition/><function_field>false</function_field><internal_type display_value="Reference">reference</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>32</max_length><name>sys_user</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference display_value="" name="sys_user">sys_user</reference><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-24 14:54:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>41e58973477331100a89bb30116d43b7</sys_id><sys_name>Manager L4</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_sys_user_u_manager_l4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-24 14:54:55</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>false</virtual><virtual_type>script</virtual_type><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_381c78b7473331100a89bb30116d4356
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.hierarchy</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>hierarchy</name><script><![CDATA[var hierarchy = Class.create();
hierarchy.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },


	getUser: function(userID){
		var grU = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grU.addQuery('sys_id',userID);
		grU.query();
		if (grU.next())
		{return grU;}
	},
	
	//Retornar o gerente / superior direto
	//Retorna o nome

	getManagerArray: function(userID){
		var manager = [];
		var output ="";
		var grU = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grU.addQuery('sys_id',userID);
		grU.query();
		grU.next();
		if(grU.manager){
			output=grU.manager.getDisplayValue()+' -> '+output;
			manager.push(grU.getValue("sys_id"));
			manager.push(grU.manager.getDisplayValue());

		}
		return output;		
	},
	
	//Retornar o gerente / superior direto
	//Retorna o nome

	getManager: function(userID){
		var manager = [];
		var output ="";
		var grU = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grU.addQuery('sys_id',userID);
		grU.query();
		grU.next();
		if(grU.manager){
			output=grU;
		}
		return output;		
	},
	
	//Retornar o manager do manager
	//Retorna o glideRecord
	getL2Manager: function(userID){
		var manager = [];
		var output ="";
		var grU = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grU.addQuery('sys_id',userID);
		grU.query();
		grU.next();
		if(grU.manager){
			output=this.getUser(grU.manager.manager);//.manager.getDisplayValue()+' -> '+output;
			manager.push(grU.getValue("sys_id"));
			manager.push(grU.manager.getDisplayValue());

		}
		return output;		
	},
	
	//Retornar o L3 = manager do manager do manager
	//Retorna o glideRecord
	//Do Nivel mais baixo seria o GS
	getL3Manager: function(userID){
		var manager = [];
		var output ="";
		var grU = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grU.addQuery('sys_id',userID);
		grU.query();
		grU.next();
		if(grU.manager){
			output=this.getUser(grU.manager.manager.manager);//.manager.getDisplayValue()+' -> '+output;
			manager.push(grU.getValue("sys_id"));
			manager.push(grU.manager.getDisplayValue());

		}
		return output;		
	},
	
	//Retornar o L4 = manager do manager do manager do manager
	//Retorna o glideRecord
	//Do Nivel mais baixo seria o GS
	getL4Manager: function(userID){
		var manager = [];
		var output ="";
		var grU = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grU.addQuery('sys_id',userID);
		grU.query();
		grU.next();
		if(grU.manager){
			output=this.getUser(grU.manager.manager.manager.manager);//.manager.getDisplayValue()+' -> '+output;
			manager.push(grU.getValue("sys_id"));
			manager.push(grU.manager.getDisplayValue());

		}
		return output;		
	},
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	//Retornar cargo especifico superintendente
	//indexOf('bison', 2)
	getSupex: function(userID){
		var currentUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		if (currentUser.get(userID)) {
			var manager = currentUser.manager;
			while (manager) {
				var managerUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
				if (managerUser.get(manager)) {
					if (managerUser.title.toLowerCase().includes('superintendente')) {
						return managerUser;
						}
					manager = managerUser.manager;
					} else {
						// gerente não encontrado para po loopManager record not found, break the loop -
						break;
						}
			}//Fim while
		}//Fim IF userID
	//Se o usuario não tem um superior retorna nulo	
	// If the current user is a superintendente or doesn't have a superior with the role, return null
    return null;
		
	},
	
	//Retornar cargo especifico superintendente ou diretor
	getSupexOrDirector: function(userID){
		
		var currentUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		if (currentUser.get(userID)) {
			var manager = currentUser.manager;
			
			while (manager) {
				gs.log("manager = " + currentUser.manager.name);
				var managerUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
				if (managerUser.get(manager)) {
					var managerTitle = managerUser.title.toLowerCase();
					// Verificar se o superior é um superintendente
					if (managerTitle.includes('superintendente')) {
						return managerUser;
					}else if (managerTitle.includes('diretor')) { // Verificar se o superior é um diretor
                    return managerUser;
					}
                // Se não for superintendente ou diretor, continuar subindo na hierarquia
                //manager = managerUser.manager;
            } else {
                //Se não possuir um gerente para o loop /  Manager record not found, break the loop
                break;
            }
        }
    }

    // Se o usuário atual é um superintendente ou diretor, ou não tem um superior com esses papéis, retornar null
    return null;
},
	
	
	//Retornar toda hierarquia	em texto
	getPathtManager: function(userID){
		var level = 0;
		var path = "";
		level++;
  var sep = level==1?level + ". " :" -> " + level + ". ";
  var grU = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
  grU.addQuery('sys_id',userID);
  grU.query();
  if(grU.next()){
    if(grU.manager){
      path += sep + grU.getDisplayValue() + this.getPathManager(grU.manager.getValue(),path,level);
    }else{
      path += sep + grU.getDisplayValue();
    }
	}
  return path;
	},

	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	//como executar
	//var objHi = new global.hierarchy();
	//objHi.processL5();
	
	//Executa hierarquia L2
	processL2: function(userID){
		var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		var userGr2;
		
		if (userID)
			{userGr.addQuery('sys_id', userID);}
		//userGr.addEncodedQuery("manager!=NULL^titleLIKEgerente");
			
		//userGr.setLimit(10); //Limite de número de registros
		// Executar a consulta
		userGr.query();
		// Iterar sobre os registros encontrados
		while (userGr.next()) {
			//if (userGr.manager.manager.title.toLowerCase.indexOf('superintendente')!== -1) {
			if (userGr.manager.manager){	
				this.processUserL2(userGr, userGr.manager.manager);

				//gs.info("==>" + userGr.name + "#()" + userGr.sys_id + ")#> " + userGr.manager.name + ":" + userGr.manager.title);
			}
		}
	},
	
	processL3: function(userID){
		var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		var userGr2;
		
		if (userID)
			{userGr.addQuery('sys_id', userID);}
		//userGr.addEncodedQuery("manager!=NULL^titleLIKEgerente");
			
		//userGr.setLimit(10); //Limite de número de registros
		// Executar a consulta
		userGr.query();
		// Iterar sobre os registros encontrados
		while (userGr.next()) {
			//if (userGr.manager.manager.title.toLowerCase.indexOf('superintendente')!== -1) {
			if (userGr.manager.manager.manager){	
				this.processUserL3(userGr, userGr.manager.manager.manager);

				//gs.info("==>" + userGr.name + "#()" + userGr.sys_id + ")#> " + userGr.manager.name + ":" + userGr.manager.title);
			}
		}
	},

	processL4: function(userID){
		var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		var userGr2;
		
		if (userID)
			{userGr.addQuery('sys_id', userID);}
		//userGr.addEncodedQuery("manager!=NULL^titleLIKEgerente");
			
		//userGr.setLimit(10); //Limite de número de registros
		// Executar a consulta
		userGr.query();
		// Iterar sobre os registros encontrados
		while (userGr.next()) {
			//if (userGr.manager.manager.title.toLowerCase.indexOf('superintendente')!== -1) {
			if (userGr.manager.manager.manager.manager){	
				this.processUserL4(userGr, userGr.manager.manager.manager.manager);

				//gs.info("==>" + userGr.name + "#()" + userGr.sys_id + ")#> " + userGr.manager.name + ":" + userGr.manager.title);
			}
		}
	},
	processL5: function(userID){
		var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		var userGr2;
		
		if (userID)
			{userGr.addQuery('sys_id', userID);}
		//userGr.addEncodedQuery("manager!=NULL^titleLIKEgerente");
			
		//userGr.setLimit(10); //Limite de número de registros
		// Executar a consulta
		userGr.query();
		// Iterar sobre os registros encontrados
		while (userGr.next()) {
			//if (userGr.manager.manager.title.toLowerCase.indexOf('superintendente')!== -1) {
			if (userGr.manager.manager.manager.manager.manager){	
				this.processUserL5(userGr, userGr.manager.manager.manager.manager.manager);

				//gs.info("==>" + userGr.name + "#()" + userGr.sys_id + ")#> " + userGr.manager.name + ":" + userGr.manager.title);
			}
		}
	},

	processPath: function(userID){
		var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		var strPath = "";
		
		if (userID)
			{userGr.addQuery('sys_id', userID);}
		//userGr.addEncodedQuery("manager!=NULL^titleLIKEgerente");
			
		//userGr.setLimit(10); //Limite de número de registros
		// Executar a consulta
		userGr.query();
		// Iterar sobre os registros encontrados
		while (userGr.next()) {
			//if (userGr.manager.manager.title.toLowerCase.indexOf('superintendente')!== -1) {
			if (userGr.manager){	
				strPath = this.getPathtManager(userGr.sys_id);
				userGr.u_manager_path.setValue(strPath);

				//gs.info("==>" + userGr.name + "#()" + userGr.sys_id + ")#> " + userGr.manager.name + ":" + userGr.manager.title);
			}
		}
	},
	
	//Executa hierarquia gerente departamento
	processGerDepto: function(userID){
		var palavraProcurada = "superintendente";
		// Inicializar o GlideRecord para a tabela sys_user
		var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		var userGr2;
		
		if (userID)
			{userGr.addQuery('sys_id', userID);}
		// Adicionar uma condição para filtrar usuários com título contendo "GERENTE DEPARTAMENTO"
		userGr.addQuery('title', 'LIKE', '%GERENTE DEPARTAMENTO%');
		//userGr.setLimit(200); //Limite de número de registros
		// Executar a consulta
		userGr.query();

		// Iterar sobre os registros encontrados
		while (userGr.next()) {
			// verificação se o cargo do superior direto é Superintendente
			//if (userGr.manager.includes('Superintendente')) {
							
			if (userGr.manager.title.toLowerCase.indexOf('superintendente')!== -1) {	
				//userGr2 = this.getManager(userGr.sys_id);
				this.processUser(userGr, userGr.manager);
				//return managerUser;

             }
//			gs.info("==>" + userGr.name + "#()" + userGr.sys_id + ")#> " + userGr.manager.name + ":" + userGr.manager.title);

		}
	},
	
	
	
	
	//Retornar toda hierarquia	
	processSupex: function(userID){
		// Inicializar o GlideRecord para a tabela sys_user
		var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		if (userID)
			{userGr.addQuery('sys_id', userID);}
		// Adicionar uma condição para filtrar usuários com título contendo "superintendente"
		userGr.addQuery('title', 'LIKE', '%superintendente%');
		//userGr.setLimit(200);
		// Executar a consulta
		userGr.query();

		// Iterar sobre os registros encontrados
		while (userGr.next()) {
			// BUsca se o cargo é gerente
			//if (userGr.manager.title.toLowerCase.includes('diretor')) {
			if (userGr.manager.title.toLowerCase.indexOf('diretor')!== -1) {
				this.processUser(userGr, userGr.manager);
				//return managerUser;
				gs.info("Sys_id do Superintendente: " + userGr.name + "#" + userGr.sys_id + "#" + userGr.manager.name);
             }
			
		}
	},
	
	


//Update functions

	//Funcao para atualizar o campo u_manager_l2
	processUserL2: function(userGr, manID) {
      // Lógica para buscar o superintendente
      
      // Atualiza o campo u_manager_l2 e desativa o workflow
      userGr.u_manager_l2.setValue(manID);
      userGr.setWorkflow(false);	//não executar outras rotinas após update
      userGr.update();
   },

	//Funcao para atualizar o campo u_manager_l3
	processUserL3: function(userGr, manID) {
      // Lógica para buscar o superintendente
      
      // Atualiza o campo u_manager_l3 e desativa o workflow
      userGr.u_manager_l3.setValue(manID);
      userGr.setWorkflow(false);	//não executar outras rotinas após update
      userGr.update();
   },

   //Funcao para atualizar o campo u_manager_l3
	processUserL4: function(userGr, manID) {
      // Lógica para buscar o superintendente
      
      // Atualiza o campo u_manager_l3 e desativa o workflow
      userGr.u_manager_l4.setValue(manID);
      userGr.setWorkflow(false);	//não executar outras rotinas após update
      userGr.update();
   },

   //Funcao para atualizar o campo u_manager_l3
	processUserL5: function(userGr, manID) {
      // Lógica para buscar o superintendente
      
      // Atualiza o campo u_manager_l3 e desativa o workflow
      userGr.u_manager_l5.setValue(manID);
      userGr.setWorkflow(false);	//não executar outras rotinas após update
      userGr.update();
   },
   
    type: 'hierarchy'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-24 14:13:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>381c78b7473331100a89bb30116d4356</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>hierarchy</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_381c78b7473331100a89bb30116d4356</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-24 16:25:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_documentation element="u_manager_l2" label="Manager L2" language="en" table="sys_user"><sys_documentation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><element>u_manager_l2</element><help/><hint/><label>Manager L2</label><language>en</language><name>sys_user</name><plural>Manager L2s</plural><sys_class_name>sys_documentation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-24 14:52:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>9d854173477331100a89bb30116d433c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Manager L2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_documentation_sys_user_u_manager_l2_en</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-24 14:52:57</sys_updated_on><url/><url_target/></sys_documentation></sys_documentation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_dictionary_sys_user_u_manager_l2
sys_update_xml.payload:
